title: Jesus: Fact or Fiction?
content:
You may have heard about theorists who say that Jesus was different to Who the Church says He Is, but there are a lurking group who claim that He never existed at all. 
 
In this talk for the UTS Catholic Society ‘s Christ Week, Robert Haddad explains and responds to “Mythicism” – the theory that Jesus Christ never existed. 
 http://cradio.org.au/assets/unichaplaincies/RobertHaddad_JesusFactOrFiction.mp3 
RIGHT-CLICK TO DOWNLOAD (44:39) 
 
The post Jesus: Fact or Fiction? appeared first on Cradio .
